author: Ryan Sidle
description: Real Madrid are La Liga champions for the first time since 2012.
title: BREAKING: Real Madrid Win La Liga Title With Win Over Malaga | SPORTbible

author: BBC Sport
description: Updates as Real Madrid go for the point at Malaga they need to win La Liga, with Barcelona ready to pounce against Eibar if they slip up.
title: La Liga final day - Ronaldo scores, Barca behind

author:
Caitlin Murray                    

                                    
                        @caitlinmurr
description: Real Madrid had a historically good La Liga campaign and they are the champs for it.
title: Cristiano Ronaldo leads Real Madrid to first La Liga title in 5 years, capping off dominant season | FOX Sports

author: BBC Sport
description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

description: Real took the La Liga crown in comfortable fashion on Sunday, with Cristiano Ronaldo's second-minute goal leaving little doubt of a 33rd championship.
title: Ronaldo, Madrid avoid last-day drama to clinch La Liga title with Malaga win

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus have reportedly made enquiries for Atletico Madrid winger Yannick Carrasco, but the La Liga side are unwilling to sell.
title: Juventus make Carrasco enquiries

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus have reportedly made enquiries for Atletico Madrid winger Yannick Carrasco, but the La Liga side are unwilling to sell.
title: Juventus make Carrasco enquiries

author: BBC Sport
description: Real Madrid win their first La Liga title since 2012 thanks to a final-day victory at Malaga.
title: Malaga 0-2 Real Madrid

author: FourFourTwo
description: Cristiano slammed the media's treatment of him in the aftermath of Real Madrid's 2-0 win over Malaga, which secured them the La Liga title.
title: Ronaldo hits out at critics after firing Madrid to LaLiga glory

author: talkSPORT
description: Cristiano Ronaldo has set yet another new record. The Real Madrid forward surpassed Jimmy Greaves' tally of 366 goals in Europe's top five leagues, netting his 367th and 368th in a 4-1 win over Celta Vigo in La Liga on Wednesday night. Record aside though, plenty remain split between determining who is the better player: Lionel Messi or Cristiano Ronaldo. While comparisons distract from the spectacle of watching two of the greatest ever footballers in action, we couldn't help but see how the two compare in front of goal in recent years.
title: Messi v Ronaldo: How the Barcelona and Real Madrid stars' club goal records compare, season-by-season
